dimension: 12 5/8 x 83 3/8 x 77 in. (32.1 x 211.8 x 195.6 cm) (overall, without handles)
title: Model of original scheme for the Minneapolis Society of Fine Arts
description: 4-part plaster and wood model with front columned entry flanked by 2 small porches with columns; colonnades on both sides; curved back with small porch at center
creditline: Transfer from The Minneapolis Society of Fine Arts
